div.p: This code system http://fhir.health.gov.lk/CodeSystem/allergy-intolerance-code-cs defines the following code:

tr.td: Level 1 is the bottom level, below the lower edge of the pectoralis minor muscle.

title.value: LK Core Allergy Intolerance Code System

description.value: Substances, medciations and other allergens for Sri Lanka

definition.value: Level 1 is the bottom level, below the lower edge of the pectoralis minor muscle.
